description:
Textbooks and mandarin courses often lack real word usefulness, teaching stilted phrases that no one really uses in China. In this course we look at real word situations and tasks that non-chinese face in China on a regular basis that require speaking mandarin. This is a real mandarin Chinese for the real world. Don't waste your time learning things no one says or can understand!

Taught by a native chinese speaker and a non-native chinese as a second language speaker using dialogues written from real life interactions between native Chinese. Each lesson is selected to emphasize interactions that non-chinese face in China on a regular basis. Real chinese for real life.

Here’s what other students are saying about this course:

“It’s a great course & I enjoyed it so much” – Raj

“This course helped me learn Chinese & will benefit me a lot” - Atif.

“Excellent course! Just what I was looking for. It has helped me make the jump from my textbook to speaking” - Dan.

“Really enjoyed the course & learnt a lot from it” - Kamran

Learn how to:

  • Shop and checkout
  • Pay bills
  • Give a taxi driver directions
  • Answer your phone
  • Ask Chinese friends for assistance
  • More...

Each lesson of this course includes an introduction, dialogue in chinese between two native speakers (fast, medium and slow), dialogue translated into english, a detailed discussion and dissection of the dialogue, key vocabulary summary of the dialogue, a review quiz and even downloadable handouts. Why not try one of our lessons for free, on us!

See You on the Inside!
title: Chinese for Beginners: Real Mandarin for Real Life
instructors: Eric Vander Wal, Dr. Bailey  Xu Tian
